# <a name="print-email-and-calendars-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="fbdb8-102">Tisk e-mailů a kalendářů v Outlook.com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fbdb8-102">Print email and calendars in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fbdb8-103">Při tisku e-mailové zprávy:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fbdb8-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="fbdb8-104">Vyberte zprávu, kterou chcete vytisknout.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fbdb8-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="fbdb8-105">V pravém horním rohu zprávy vyberte tři tečky</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fbdb8-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="fbdb8-106">a vyberte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fbdb8-106">and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="fbdb8-107">**Tisk**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fbdb8-107">**Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fbdb8-108">Tisk kalendáře:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fbdb8-108">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="fbdb8-109">V pravém horním rohu stránky vyberte možnost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fbdb8-109">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="fbdb8-110">**Tisk**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fbdb8-110">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="fbdb8-111">Zvolte oblast zobrazení a čas a vyberte možnost **Tisk**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fbdb8-111">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="fbdb8-112">Další informace o [tisku e-mailu a kalendáře v Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="fbdb8-112">Learn more about how to [print email and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
